Package org.apache.cocoon.transformation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CharacterEventConcatenatorTransformer  
    CInitiateTransformer
    Process another request in a new thread, continuing the current request.
    CookieTransformer
    A Cocoon transformer for handling cookies.
    HTMLCharacterTransformer
    According to [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTML_decimal_character_rendering]: HTML forbids the use of the characters with Universal Character Set/Unicode code points * 0000 to 0008 * 0011 to 0012 * 0014 to 0031 * 0127 * 0128 to 0159 (see [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Windows-1252]) * 55296 to 57343 These characters are not even allowed by reference.
    HtmlMailTransformer
    This Transformer is capable of sending emails with inline images, but without attachments.
    LOWProfilerTransformer  
    MessageLoggerTransformer  
    MultiFragmentTraxTransformer
    Apply a TrAX transformer to selected parts of the input document.
    NamespaceStripperTransformer  
    NoOpTransformer  
    PipelineSlowdownTransformer  
    QuartzTransformer
    This transformer can list Quartz Cronjobs and add new cronjobs or delete them.
    ResponseHeaderTransformer
    Set HTTP response headers from an XML document.
    SAXEventTransformer  
    SendMailTransformer
    The SendMailTransformer send mails using SMTP including attachments with the specific parameters read from a configuration-file and delivers furthermore a report, where a state to each sent mail can bee seen.
    SparqlTransformer
    This transformer can send queries to a ReST SPARQL endpoint.
    StreamingSourceWritingTransformer  
    StripNameSpacesTransformer  
    YetAnotherSourceWritingTransformer  
    ZipItTransformer
    This transformer creates a new Zip file on disk.
